asgn2Tests

Class PizzaTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Tests.PizzaTests

  • public class PizzaTests
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that that tests the asgn2Pizzas.MargheritaPizza, asgn2Pizzas.VegetarianPizza, asgn2Pizzas.MeatLoversPizza classes. Note that an instance of asgn2Pizzas.MeatLoversPizza should be used to test the functionality of the asgn2Pizzas.Pizza abstract class.
    Author:
    Khar Jun Shum
